observation: I can see a sign-up page for Deriv with multiple language selection modals open. There's a residence selection form visible on the right side with a Country/region dropdown that shows 'Select' and a Next button. I need to close these language modals first and then proceed with the sign-up flow by selecting a country/region.
reasoning: I need to close the language selection modals that are blocking the main signup form. I can see a close button (×) at element 31 which appears to be for closing the language modal.
ux_issues: Multiple overlapping language selection modals are confusing and blocking the main signup process
The modals appear to have opened multiple times making the interface cluttered

outcome.visual_observation: The language selection modal/overlay has been closed. The form is now visible without the modal overlay. The page has progressed from showing cryptocurrency trading coins to showing a mobile app interface with payment methods (STICPAY, Skrill) and wallet functionality. The sign-up flow has advanced to the next step showing 'Fast deposits, quick withdrawals' content.
